column5: For anyone who's interested......this could cause problems for all of us who fish Lake Erie.  http://www.buffalonews.com/incoming/article486787.ece
Thanks for the read.  It is a little bit depressing isn't it?
Could be a problem for more than just anglers... billy bob may not have enough electricity to use his computer.  Those are some huge numbers.
Looks like my boat will be sitting on bottom again
